TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCLayerRGBA extends Cocos2D.CCLayer implements class Cocos2D.ICCRGBAProtocol

Docs.summary: is a subclass of that implements the RGBAProtocol protocol using a solid color as the background.
Docs.remarks: <para> <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLayerRGBA" /> is a subclass of <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLayer" /> that implements the <ref refid="classcocos2d_1_1_r_g_b_a_protocol" kindref="compound">RGBAProtocol</ref> protocol using a solid color as the background.</para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLayerRGBA" /><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLayer" /><ref refid="classcocos2d_1_1_r_g_b_a_protocol" kindref="compound">RGBAProtocol</ref><para>All features from <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLayer" /> are valid, plus the following new features that propagate into children that conform to the <ref refid="classcocos2d_1_1_r_g_b_a_protocol" kindref="compound">RGBAProtocol</ref>:<list type="bullet"><item><description>opacity</description></item><item><description>RGB colors 2.1 </description></item></list></para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCLayer" /><ref refid="classcocos2d_1_1_r_g_b_a_protocol" kindref="compound">RGBAProtocol</ref><list type="bullet"> <item> <description>opacity</description> </item> <item> <description>RGB colors 2.1 </description> </item> </list><para>opacity</para><para>RGB colors <para>2.1 </para></para><para>2.1 </para><para>2.1 </para>

Docs.summary: Changes the color with R,G,B bytes
Docs.remarks: <para>Changes the color with R,G,B bytes</para><para /><parameterlist kind="param"> <parameteritem> <parameternamelist> <parametername>color</parametername> </parameternamelist> <parameterdescription> <para>Example: Color3B(255,100,0) means R=255, G=100, B=0 </para> </parameterdescription> </parameteritem> </parameterlist><parameteritem> <parameternamelist> <parametername>color</parametername> </parameternamelist> <parameterdescription> <para>Example: Color3B(255,100,0) means R=255, G=100, B=0 </para> </parameterdescription> </parameteritem><parameternamelist> <parametername>color</parametername> </parameternamelist><parametername>color</parametername><parameterdescription> <para>Example: Color3B(255,100,0) means R=255, G=100, B=0 </para> </parameterdescription><para>Example: Color3B(255,100,0) means R=255, G=100, B=0 </para>

<para>Returns the displayed color.</para><para> <para>The <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCColor3B" /> contains R,G,B bytes. </para> </para><para>The <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCColor3B" /> contains R,G,B bytes. </para><see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCColor3B" /><para>The <see cref="T:Cocos2D.CCColor3B" /> contains R,G,B bytes. </para>

<para>Returns the displayed opacity.</para><para> <para>The opacity of sprite, from 0 ~ 255 </para> </para><para>The opacity of sprite, from 0 ~ 255 </para><para>The opacity of sprite, from 0 ~ 255 </para>
